item.description:
Web 2.0 Tools for Web Designers by Chris Amato

The term "Web 2.0" has been defined many ways, from the path to eNirvana to pure marketing gibberish. In this discussion, we explore a specific understanding of term, looking at various cases which suggest that Web 2.0 may in part represent a set of actually useful tools for getting things done. We review, demo, and experiment with some especially interesting examples, focusing on tools relevant to web design.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: WEB 2.0 Presentation
